fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier

Class DoubleQNPKL

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier.DoubleQNPKL
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Classifier<double[]>, KernelSVM<double[]>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DoubleQNPKL
extends java.lang.Object
implements KernelSVM<double[]>, java.io.Serializable

    Implementation of the QNPKL solver.
    Original java code

    Learning geometric combinations of Gaussian kernels with alternating Quasi-Newton algorithm
    Picard, D. and Thome, N. and Cord, M and Rakotomamonjy, A.
    Proceedings of the 20th ESANN conference, 2012, Bruges, 79-84

    Author:
    dpicard
    See Also:
